classes.name: zui-pagination
classes.description: The class that identifies an HTML element as a pagination element.

classes.name: zui-pagination-primary
classes.description: The primary container which is the left side of a the pagination box.

classes.name: zui-pagination-secondary
classes.description: The secondary container which is the right side of a the pagination box.

classes.name: zui-pagination-from
classes.description: The from part in the pager has this class so it can be populated via JavaScript.

classes.name: zui-pagination-till
classes.description: The till part in the pager has this class so it can be populated via JavaScript.

classes.name: zui-pagination-total
classes.description: The total part in the pager has this class so it can be populated via JavaScript.
